operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/write

operations.description: Bulk claims the devices. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names when bulk claiming devices to a catalog only.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/claimDevices/action

operations.description: Counts devices in device group. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product or device group name.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/countDevices/action

operations.description: List Device resources by DeviceGroup. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product or device group name.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/devices/read

operations.description: Get a Device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names when a device does not belong to a device group and product.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/devices/read

operations.description: Create a Device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names to claim a device to the catalog only.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/devices/write

operations.description: Delete a Device
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/devices/delete

operations.description: Update a Device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names to move a device to the catalog level.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/devices/write

operations.description: Generates the capability image for the device. Use '.unassigned' or '.default' for the device group and product names to generate the image for a device that does not belong to a specific device group and product.
operations.name: Microsoft.AzureSphere/catalogs/products/deviceGroups/devices/generateCapabilityImage/action

operations.description: List Deployment resources by DeviceGroup. '.default' and '.unassigned' are system defined values and cannot be used for product or device group name.
